body_html:
Based on the reports earlier in this thread,
I've made a change to nsync that defines _DARWIN_C_SOURCE
in the relevant builds in the bazel BUILD file, the cmake CMakeLists.txt file,
and the relevant Makefiles.

Could someone running Sierra could try these and report whether they work?

body:
Based on the reports earlier in this thread, 
I've made a change to nsync that defines _DARWIN_C_SOURCE
in the relevant builds in the bazel BUILD file, the cmake CMakeLists.txt file,
and the relevant Makefiles.  

Could someone running Sierra could try these and report whether they work?
